WorkItem.ClosedComment: Master Shapeshifter is a talent, not a buff. Only raid buffs, pots, flasks and set bonuses are on the Buffs pane
WorkItem.Description: Why is Master Shapeshifter not on the buff list?

Comments.Message: OK, now this guy must just be trolling.
Nope. Just a noob :) Ask Blizzard.

As Jothay said, Master Shapeshifter is a talent, not a raid buff (or a pot/flask/set bonus). Therefore it will NOT be located on the Buffs pane.  It WILL however be in the Talents pane where you set up your talents.  Once you select Master Shapeshifter in talents, it's effects will be counted in the calculations.
Thank you. Best help I've gotten so far >.>
